attributes.action: make it illegal to put the categories of gender, sex, race and origin on application forms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many application forms have compulsory categories such as gender, sex, race and origin that applicants are required to fill in. What should be important when applying for a job is the skills that you have. 

I ask that the Prime Minister look at erasing these categories on application forms as it should not affect whether or not you are employed or not.
